page.title: 15Winchfield - Law & Order.
page.content: The block is policed largely by car or motorcycle patrols from Fleet & Hartley Wintney.{Fleet Police Station covers the area to the south of the M3 &{Hartley Wintney}covers the area to the north. The motorway is patrolled by the traffic depts. from Aldershot, Farnborough & Basingstoke. There are few{traffic accidents}in the area (excluding the M3) & those which do occur are usually a result of speeding or underestimating the width of the vehicle.{Recorded crime}in the block is mainly 'thefts' from unattended ve- -hicles or building-sites. The occas- -ional poacher is arrested & periodic- -ally there is a burglary. Such minor offences are, on the whole, what you'd expect in a small rural area. The rail -way station & the M3 service station are obvious targets for various crimes & receive the necessary attention.
